Jeff Irwin’s home page

Highlights of some of my toys include:

  • A 3D model viewer for TempleOS
  • A visualizer for Bohemian matrices
  • A Rubik’s cube game that you can play in your browser
  • A heat mapping tool for fitness data
  • A transcoding of the complete COVID-19 genome to mp3

For more, see my GitHub profile
